title: Bootstrap Accordions
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Vertically Collapsing Lists
An accordion is a group of stacked text items where usually only one can be expanded at a time.

### Structure
1. `.accordion`: Wrapper.
2. `.accordion-item`: Single unit.
3. `.accordion-header` + Button trigger.
4. `.accordion-collapse` + `.accordion-body`: Content.

common_mistakes.correction: For the 'only one open at a time' behavior, each item must reference the parent ID in `data-bs-parent`. Without this, they act independently.
